title: Trust badges near CTA
body:
Adding trust 
badges near the primary CTA increased signups by 12%.

title: Above-the-fold form
body:
Visible form 
above the fold lifted lead submissions by 9%.

title: Qualifying question
body:
A single 
qualifying question improved demo attendance by 6%.

title: Test ID visibility
body:
Showing test IDs 
on hover sped up analyst workflows.

title: Down-funnel icon
body:
Green funnel means 
>10% down-funnel uplift; red means <=0%.

title: Trust Me
body: You have to believe in me because what I am telling you is right.

title: Trust Yourself
body: You have to trust in yourself because you are what you trust
